## SDQ vs TSQ

Software When comparing the Strengths and Difficulties Questionnaire (SDQ) and the Trauma Screening Questionnaire (TSQ), researchers and psychologists often go through the time-consuming and subjective process of manual harmonisation. However, with the advent of Harmony, the newly developed software specifically for psychologists, the comparison of SDQ vs TSQ can be made far more efficiently and effectively. Harmony leverages progressive natural language processing and generative AI models that aid researchers in the harmonisation of questionnaire items in diverse languages. Improving the comparison process of SDQ vs TSQ, Harmony offers an expansive database of instruments and also gives the flexibility to incorporate user's individual instruments via a user-friendly web interface. You can conveniently upload SDQ and TSQ in PDF format, and Harmony will use its large language models to compare the questionnaires, providing a percentage match for each item. This simplifies and speeds up the process of comparing the components and items in SDQ and TSQ. For the purpose of more comprehensive and cross-study comparisons in SDQ vs TSQ, Harmony is the go-to tool. Not only does it automate the monotonous task of manual harmonisation, but Harmony also enables researchers to verify results across numerous studies, testing the consistency of these results, or identifying variations under changing social conditions. Let the smart functionalities of Harmony streamline your psychology research and harmonisation tasks like never before.

## Compare the items in SDQ and TSQ

* <a href="https://harmonydata.ac.uk/app/#_" target="harmonyapp">Import SDQ and TSQ into Harmony and harmonise them</a> - find similarities between the two instruments using our AI platform
* <a href="https://harmonydata.ac.uk/app/#_" target="harmonyapp">Import just SDQ into Harmony</a> - compare SDQ with other instruments
* <a href="https://harmonydata.ac.uk/app/#_" target="harmonyapp">Import just TSQ into Harmony</a> - compare TSQ with other instruments
